ygData.subject: Weapon selections..
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Well its time for me to call upon the experinced souls here to get some advice regarding weapons. I have the following weapons at my disposal: - Ebon
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
Well its time for me to call upon the experinced souls here to get some advice
regarding weapons. I have the following weapons at my disposal:
- Ebon Razor (Primary only) Damage 9, Delay 25, +4 fire, cold & magic prot. Wt.
3.5.
- Short Sword of the Ykesha: Damage 8, Delay 24, Weight 4.5. Effect of Ykesha
(75 point direct damage spell)
- Staff of Writhing 9/33 Diret proc Damage 48
- Bladed thullian claws (Primary only). 5/19
- Silvery War Axe 6/22
Currently Im wielding the Ebon Razor and the yak and I think my damage is better
than with the yak in primary and Silvery in off hand. But I have my doubts. Im
not satisfied with the yak being placed in my offhand. Do any of you have
suggestions for a better weapon setup?
I have been thinking of getting a second yak, but I find the proc is resisted
quite a lot by kunark mobs atleast.

Regards
Musiker(x) Silverdrum, bard of the 38th song, bertox
